alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 24 at 12:59PM EST until December 24 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...In Maryland, Central and Eastern Allegany County. In West Virginia, Hampshire, Hardy, Eastern Grant and Eastern Mineral Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
